document_data.name: Gekh Coal
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gekh Coal''' was a slaver and follower of [[the Absolute]] who led operations for [[duergar]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists of the Absolute]] near the [[Ebonlake]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You got a bloody rotflower for company? Must've let it get in your head. My axe'll fix that in no time...|Gekh Coal, to companions.}}
document_data.Personality: He was a vicious and hateful individual who was not above slaying the children of other species.
document_data.Possessions: He wielded an ''[[exterminator's axe]]'' and wore a pair of ''[[boots of speed]]'', that were stolen by the [[deep gnome]] [[Thulla]].
document_data.History:
[[File:Gekh_Kill.png|thumb|right|300px|''Sovereign [[Spaw]]'s vision of Gekh Coal slaying innocent [[myconid]]s.'']]
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Gekh and his fellow cultists led a raid on the [[svirfneblin]] of [[Clan Ironhand]], slaying some and taking others captive. The survivors were sent to [[True Soul]] [[Nere]], used as labor in the excavation of [[Grymforge]]. They also raided the [[myconid]] colony of [[Ebonlake Grotto]] and killed many of its inhabitants, even the juveniles.
